WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying the Tree model and the whole gear least on the right only shows the blue part of the graph, which is MP5. Even though the Sort os set to Overall, it does not take HpS, Survival and ToL in consideration. if I sort by HpS, the sort seemsto work fine, but no graph bars are shown at all.
Â 
Has anyone successfully managed to use the Tree model?

Comments.Message: Are you completely filling out your gear? You need to either load your character from the armory or choose each item you wear, along with enchants, and either way need to choose buffs. If so, please attach your character file that you see this problem with.

Until you set up your talents, buffs, enchants, and most of your gear it likely will only show mp5 due to the fact you would run oom given the rotation it tries to set up for a 5 minute fight. This particular class/spec can be very specific as to how differences in time on a fight will affect it, as well as the spells being cast. It can really only be trusted for a guideline considering different situations will call for different spell usage, and I don't believe it accounts for Swiftmend which is generally a "crap this person is low" button.

If you wish to see healing worth but are starting with a fresh template and don't want to search out all your items and enchants beforehand, set the Fight Length in Options to 1.5 minutes and healing will show nice and early.
Yes, I am loading my full character gear when I was wearing my resto set (I'm currently wearing my cat/DPS gear on Armory right now though). I am attaching the file for review.

Did you save the character in a resto set? That's what we need to see.
I suspect you loaded the character in feral spec and resto gear. If so, it won't load the correct talents (in this case, Intensity would be very important).

Ah, you're right... I was in feral spec, not resto. I went into the talent section and picked all the talents as if I was 0/0/61 and sure enough, all the bars properly came to life. Great work guys. I can finally work on my resto set properly with less guesswork. I do not see any problem with it now, so I guess you can close this issue. Thanks for the info.
